CustomField.description: Don't create any product index records for this product. When this option is enabled, the product doesn't appear in search results or category results on the Product List page version 2.0.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Don't create any product index records for this product. When this option is enabled, the product doesn't appear in search results or category results on the Product List page version 2.0.
CustomField.label: Exclude from Product Index
